member.name: T:IQ.Platform.Framework.WebApi.Model.Hypermedia.HypermediaResource
member.summary: Represents a resource that contains hypermedia links to other resources.

member.name: T:IQ.Platform.Framework.WebApi.Model.Hypermedia.ILinkable
member.summary: Represents object that contains hypermedia links

member.name: T:IQ.Platform.Framework.WebApi.Model.Hypermedia.IAccessControlList
member.summary: Represents object that contains resource metadata

member.name: M:IQ.Platform.Framework.WebApi.Model.Hypermedia.HypermediaResource.GetDynamicLinks
member.summary: Returns dynamic links for this resource that need to be generated at runtime.
member.remarks: This method can be overridden in a derived class to provide additional links that require runtime data to generate.

member.name: T:IQ.Platform.Framework.WebApi.Model.Hypermedia.EmbeddedResource
member.summary: Represents resource or collection of resources that can be embedded in another (parent) resource. Used in implementation of oData's $expand feature and HAL's embedded resource feature.

member.name: M:IQ.Platform.Framework.WebApi.Model.Hypermedia.LinkableExtensions.GetRelationUri(IQ.Platform.Framework.WebApi.Model.Hypermedia.ILinkable,System.String,System.Uri)
member.summary: Finds and creates absolute Uri to a resource represented by given relation. The method is useful in the Api client implementation.

member.name: T:IQ.Platform.Framework.WebApi.Model.Hypermedia.NullState
member.summary: The hypermedia resource has no state
